text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
No matter how hard she runs, Rice<n>can't seem to find a win.
Still, she<n>hasn't given up on training.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Gotta give credit to Rice. Takes a<n>whole lotta something to
keep running<n>her heart out after all those losses.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Makes you wish we could get her a<n>win somehow...

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pardon the intrusion.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Wait, McQueen?!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Out of the blue, McQueen shows up to<n>practice. It feels like
it's been forever<n>since she left the team.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I saw Rice didn't do so well in her<n>last race. How's she
doing now?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
She's still got the drive, and she's<n>training like always, but
for some<n>reason she just can't deliver.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
She's still got the drive, and she's<n>training like always, but
for some<n>reason she just can't deliver.

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text:
She's just... missing something. That<n>something she had
when she raced<n>you and Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...I see.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Perhaps she's lost sight of a target to<n>chase.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Which means that if you're able to<n>give her a new target,
she may run<n>like she once did.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: In other words... I'd best hurry and<n>get changed.
choice_data_list: Wait, what? You're going to run?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Why else do you think I've come<n>here?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
I still have some unfinished business,<n>but I have a bit more
free time than<n>before.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Besides, I don't think I can wait any<n>longer to run with the
team again.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Oh, but before that, I have a favor to<n>ask you.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: McQueen?! And...

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text: I received a sudden invite to come<n>help out.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
McQueen's "favor" was for me to<n>call Mihono Bourbon
over.

text_block_list.name: Mihono Bourbon
text_block_list.text:
I've been waiting for you to return to<n>form. Hopefully this
session brings<n>you closer to a win.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Bourbon... You're the best!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Now then, just like old times, I want<n>you to follow right
behind Bourbon and<n>me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Right! Just keep following you and<n>Bourbon!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: ...Just to clarify, that does notinclude in our private lives. Followwithin reason, please.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
All right! I'll chase Rice from behind<n>then! And when I catch
up to her, I'll<n>yank her tail!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hweh?!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: We'll help out too!

text_block_list.name: Caring Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Ooh, then how about we take turns<n>setting the pace?

text_block_list.name: Sincere Umamusume
text_block_list.text: Okay! Let's do this!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Rice, seeing your hard work... your<n>indomitable spirit, is a big
inspiration to<n>us all.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Now show us once more—how you<n>left me and Bourbon in
the dust.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Okay. I will!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Team Sirius. A team whose members<n>continually inspire and
push each<n>other to be better.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
With the encouragement of her<n>teammates, Rice takes to the
track<n>once more—her second spring Tenno<n>Sho.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
Hey Trainer, if I win, you'll take us to<n>that famous
amusement park... right?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Why do you think I've been eating so<n>much instant ramen?

text_block_list.name: <username>
text_block_list.text: Why do you think I've been eating so<n>much instant ramen?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Heheh... But you know, I like the other<n>park too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
As long as you're there, and the<n>team's there, we can
have fun<n>anywhere. Just seeing the others<n>smile makes
me smile too.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
And I want to make them smile today.<n>So I'm going to give
this race my all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Yeah! I should get going now!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She looks so tiny compared to the<n>expanse of turf, but she
makes it hers.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Here's Rice Shower! She makes her<n>move! She's pushed
up into the lead!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Even when her will to win seemed<n>faint, she refused to give
up, and just<n>kept running.

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower isn't giving up the lead!<n>She's desperately
holding on! And<n>now... she's done it!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
Rice Shower returns to the winner's<n>circle in the spring
Tenno Sho!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: And I'm not the only one who's<n>taken notice.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text:
After denying so many records, and<n>losing so many times,
she finally wins,<n>huh.

text_block_list.name: Fan A
text_block_list.text: How long were you gonna make us<n>wait?! Congrats, Rice!

text_block_list.name: Fan B
text_block_list.text: Good job! You were great!

text_block_list.name: Spectators
text_block_list.text: Wooo!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? Wh-wha—?!

text_block_list.name: Caster
text_block_list.text:
The cheers are deafening! The entire<n>stadium is lavishing
Rice Shower with<n>praise!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: They... they're happy... They're<n>smiling!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
When the whole world seemed to be<n>dragging her down,
she crawled back<n>up, one step at a time.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She held on. Worked harder than<n>ever. And now, she's
rewarded with<n>love from all.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: ...Thank you, everyone!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I'll keep running, forever and ever!<n>I'll run until the whole
world's smiling!
